title: FOR RENT: 1625 W Grace St 3Bed/1Bath Apartment
posting_body: If you love baseball -- particularly if you love the Chicago Cubs -- there's only one neighborhood for you: Wrigleyville!
From the luxury high-rise apartments along Lake Shore Drive to the tree-filled streets and single family homes in Graceland West, there's something for everyone in Wrigleyville.
Comfy three bedroom, one bath in the Wrigleyville neighborhood.
This unit has beautiful brick walls that lead to the bedrooms and kitchen area.

This listing includes an updated kitchen with spacious storage cabinets, in-unit washer/dryer, hardwood floors, spacious living and dining area, updated kitchen, granite counters, dishwasher, large living room, king size bedrooms and great closet space.
Short walk to nightlife and the Brown Line!
